GSD.product_version: versions from v5.7 to before v5.15.90
GSD.description:
tty: serial: qcom-geni-serial: fix slab-out-of-bounds on RX FIFO buffer

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.90 by commit cb53a3366eb28fed67850c80afa52075bb71a38a, it was introduced in version v5.7 by commit f9d690b6ece7ec9a6ff6b588df95a010ab2d66f9. For more details please see the references link.
